mapper.select: select 'depart' as area , substr(ai.barea_name,1,3) as cityName, di.depart_name,di.longitude,di.latitude,substr(ai.barea_name,4,6) AS city from depart_info di,area_info ai where longitude not in('null','0','1','待定') AND ai.sd_area_id = di.area_id

select 'area' as area,li.lan_name as cityName,ai.barea_name as departName, null as LONGITUDE,NULL as LATITUDE,null as CITY from area_info ai ,lan_info li where ai.lan_id = li.lan_id and ai.barea_name like '%${infosCustom.departName}%' union all select 'depart' as area , substr(ai.barea_name,1,3) as cityName, di.depart_name AS departName,di.longitude,di.latitude,substr(ai.barea_name,4,6) AS city from depart_info di,area_info ai where longitude not in('null','0','1','待定') AND ai.sd_area_id = di.area_id and di.depart_name like '%${infosCustom.departName}%'

select 'area' as area,li.lan_name as cityName,ai.barea_name as departName, null as LONGITUDE,NULL as LATITUDE,null as CITY from area_info ai ,lan_info li where ai.lan_id = li.lan_id and ai.barea_name like '%${departName}%' union all select 'depart' as area , substr(ai.barea_name,1,3) as cityName, di.depart_name AS departName,di.longitude,di.latitude,substr(ai.barea_name,4,6) AS city from depart_info di,area_info ai where longitude not in('null','0','1','待定') AND ai.sd_area_id = di.area_id and di.depart_name like '%${departName}%'

select 'area' as area,li.lan_name as cityName,ai.barea_name as departName, null as LONGITUDE,NULL as LATITUDE,null as CITY from area_info ai ,lan_info li where ai.lan_id = li.lan_id
union all select 'depart' as area , substr(ai.barea_name,1,3) as cityName, di.depart_name AS departName,di.longitude,di.latitude,substr(ai.barea_name,4,6) AS city from depart_info di,area_info ai where longitude not in('null','0','1','待定') AND ai.sd_area_id = di.area_id
